version_description: Various improvements and bug fixes

New type of events coming soon... Stay tuned! Recent changes:
- interface improvement
- many fixes and game optimization

- express your emotions using emoticons in duels
- watch your opponent fishing and see championship fish
- sell all the excess of lures with one click
- get extra prizes for watching a short ad
- check out new game sounds
- compete in rankings of each fish
- check out improved UI and bug fixes

- find out how to catch a bigger fish
- use emoticons during a duel even while fishing
- check out new notifications about your progress in the championship
- enjoy bug fixes and improved UI

- find out how to catch a bigger fish
- use emoticons during a duel even while fishing
- check out new notifications about your progress in the championship
- enjoy bug fixes and improved UI
New title of the game, ''Fishing Clash'', is much better reflecting the main game features !
New title of the game, ''Fishing Clash'', is much better reflecting the main game features !

- try out benefits of upgrading baits
- check out how to take part in championship as a new player
- check out faster app loading
- use new language versions of the game
- enjoy bug fixes and improvements

- check out how to take part in championship as a new player
- check out faster app loading
- use new language versions of the game
- enjoy bug fixes and improvements
Improvements and minor bug fixing.
Improvements and minor bug fixing.

- start using a new feature: random rod bonus draw
- check out improved game efficiency
- listen to a new soundtrack in Florida
- use new language versions of the game
- enjoy bug fixes and improvements

Minor fixes
Minor fixes
App preview added so that users can take a better look at our game
App preview added so that users can take a better look at our game

- check out faster opponent searching in higher rank duels
- new, clear font
- move fish in albums also vertically
- experience graphic improvement of shop, events and perk display

We've also introduced many bug fixes and improvements thanks to reports from our Players

- check out faster opponent searching in higher rank duels
- new, clear font
- move fish in albums also vertically
- experience graphic improvement of shop, events and perk display

We've also introduced many bug fixes and improvements thanks to reports from our Players

The new clan feature will introduce:
- a dedicated clan chat
- the possibility to request lures from your clan members
- a weekly clan pack to earn
- clan events
- and a lot more!

The new clan feature will introduce:
- a dedicated clan chat
- the possibility to request lures from your clan members
- a weekly clan pack to earn
- clan events
- and a lot more!
Clans improvements.
Clans improvements.
Game improvements
Game improvements
Game improvements
Game improvements

- check out new first time user experience
- enjoy bug fixes and clan improvements
- be up to date with game news

- discover new event window and clan ranking design
- catch legendary fish which will appear at fisheries soon
- play on new devices with 18.5:9 ratio
- like your clan mates achievements

- discover new event window and clan ranking design
- catch legendary fish which will appear at fisheries soon
- play on new devices with 18.5:9 ratio
- like your clan mates achievements

- discover new event window and clan ranking design
- catch legendary fish which will appear at fisheries soon
- play on new devices with 18.5:9 ratio
- like your clan mates achievements

Features
- Faster moving through game windows
- Co-leader can now remove other clan members.

Bug fixing
- The Florida collection can now be claimed,
- We fixed the bug with lures disappearing after donations,
- We fixed the display bug of multiple bonuses displayed in the duels,
- Players can't leave the duels by the back button,
- We fixed the graphical glitches during entering the duel,
- The "Good job" sign will show a lot less,
- We fixed the graphical glitches for devices with the 18:5 on 9 screen ratio,
- The national duel ranking will now be showing correctly
- 'You haven't unlocked this fishery yet' - sign will now be removed, but the requirements remain.
- We added the physical cooldown for donation, so you know when you can donate them again.

Support
- player ID number will be shorter

- check out new time-limited fish and special lures for them
- choose the fishery where you want to have a duel during an event
Game optimization
Game optimization

- now you can change the language of the game
- check out new clan chat design
- see the point count with details when catching a fish
- new languages in our game: Ukrainian, Swedish, Norwegian and Danish
Game optimization
- don't miss any rewards anymore, use new system of opening packs

- get the new power-up Sonar which will let you see what kind of fish you're reeling in
- get the new power up of Instant fishing which will let you immediately catch a fish!

- we've removed instant fishing on players' request
- sonar has been modified
- open a new, exciting pack in which you can choose lures
- take part in new quick challenges in which you can win valuable prizes
- take part in new quick challenges in which you can win valuable prizes
Game optimization

- smoother and improved gameplay
- now you can check if your clan mates are online or when they were last active in the game

- smoother and improved gameplay
- now you can check if your clan mates are online or when they were last active in the game

- The best fish give you a wide berth? Not with the NEW GEAR! Collect, modify and upgrade rods to create your personalized dream gear and be prepared to catch the biggest specimens!
- If the basic emoji range doesn’t represent your complex personality, now you can also use GOOD GAME! and I’LL WIN NEXT TIME!
- Even a modest person has to show-off sometimes, that’s why from now on you can share your achievements on the clan wall!
- And a small SURPRISE! Check what the new pack display has in store!

FRIENDS... SO MANY FRIENDS! | Now you can invite your real-life friends to join the game... and your clan!

NEW SKINS AND ITEMS | Now you can personalise your profile with even more details thanks to new icons, frames, stat displays… and much more!
MAKE A FACE | Now you get new emojis — and you can use them in the Clan chat!
ADDITIONAL GAME FIXES | Slightly boosted performance and minor bug fixes.

SKINS… AND MORE!
Don’t be a John Doe among anglers — now you can customise your profile with unique avatars, rare skins, elite badges… and more!
GRAND CLAN CHALLENGE. Clan rivalry enters a totally new level! With Grand Clan Challenges, the final result of Clan Wars can change rapidly, transferring the gameplay into a dynamic competition!
GRAND CLAN CHALLENGE. Clan rivalry enters a totally new level! With Grand Clan Challenges, the final result of Clan Wars can change rapidly, transferring the gameplay into a dynamic competition!

Optimized graphics
The game gets older but is now better looking. Almost like actors from Baywatch!

Disinsection
A few bugs were killed

Clan Wars interface optimization
The interface is now crystal clear and user friendly. Just like the entire game!

Also:
- boosted game efficiency
- improved new functionalities

CLAN EVENTS
An entirely new level of multi PvP! Compete together to achieve shared goals and win valuable rewards!

VIRTUAL… CORK BOARD?
Now clan leaders and co-leaders can pin messages, news and rules to the clan window, so that no important info will drown in floods of other notifications.

ALL ABOUT COMPETITION
New event clan rankings, in-clan rankings, prestige clan ranking... Now no one will miss who’s the best! And hopefully it’s you.

- Become the master of tactics! Now, after every duel, you can spy on your opponent and check what rod he/she uses.
- They say everyone has a few doppelgangers, but it’s not great when all of your opponents look the same. Avatars in duels are no longer multiplied.
- And, if you really want to fail deliberately, the sonar won’t prevent you anymore! Now you can break your lines easier again (if that’s what you crave for - who are we to judge!)

A few bugs were killed.
A few bugs were killed.
A few bugs were killed.
NEW LURE LEVELS. Don’t sell your lures! They may come in handy - common, rare, epic, mythical and legendary fish now get new lure levels.

LUCK. It’s always good to have luck on your side. Now you can summon it whenever you want, as it joins the power-up section on the Main Screen! Use its magic whenever you’re looking for a specific fish.

GEAR 3.0. A refurbished and redesigned gear system, now even better and more engaging than the previous version, making it easier to organize your gear and keep track of the rods and upgrades you possess.
GRAND CLAN CHALLENGE. Clan rivalry enters a totally new level! With Grand Clan Challenges, the final result of Clan Wars can change rapidly, transferring the gameplay into a dynamic competition!
GRAND CLAN CHALLENGE. Clan rivalry enters a totally new level! With Grand Clan Challenges, the final result of Clan Wars can change rapidly, transferring the gameplay into a dynamic competition!
GRAND CLAN CHALLENGE. Clan rivalry enters a totally new level! With Grand Clan Challenges, the final result of Clan Wars can change rapidly, transferring the gameplay into a dynamic competition!
GRAND CLAN CHALLENGE. Clan rivalry enters a totally new level! With Grand Clan Challenges, the final result of Clan Wars can change rapidly, transferring the gameplay into a dynamic competition!

DISINSECTION. Nobody likes bugs in a game - that’s why, with the use of a precise disinsection process, we’ve got rid of a few recurrent issues. For good.
BETTER. FASTER. STRONGER. The game’s performance has been increased. Now the game should be running smoothly even on older devices.

DISINSECTION. Nobody likes bugs in a game - that’s why, with the use of a precise disinsection process, we’ve got rid of a few recurrent issues. For good.
BETTER. FASTER. STRONGER. The game’s performance has been increased. Now the game should be running smoothly even on older devices.

NEW GAMEPLAY MODE: Wheel of Fortune!
Fancy a game of chance? Spin the wheel in between fishing sessions to win some nice goodies and… have lots of fun!
You can get:
- boosters,
- lures,
- pearls,
- coins,
- rods,
- licenses,
- and more!

Get to know the renewed Wheel of Fortune! You can get the Wheel of Fortune with a guaranteed prize after a few spins or buy extra spins.
Discover changes in the new gear which will help you choose the best rod to reach the best results!
Get to know the renewed Wheel of Fortune! You can get the Wheel of Fortune with a guaranteed prize after a few spins or buy extra spins.
Discover changes in the new gear which will help you choose the best rod to reach the best results!

Tweak your gear!
We know you have a tight schedule (and lines), so straight to the point.
We’ve got rid of those annoying things in the game to make fishing even more enjoyable.
Now, Fishing Clash will work smoother, faster and with fewer crashes.
Tight lines!

Stand up and fight!
The rule is simple: only the best anglers remain standing.
Fishing Clash introduces an exciting addition to the gameplay –Fishing Battle.

Compete against others on a multiplayer basis.
Feel the extreme rivalry – so close to your heart.
Do your best in each round: score better than others to get to the next one.
Each round the lowest-scoring players will be eliminated.

Become the Fishing Battle Champion. Win the most amazing rewards.

Skirmish Titans.

NEW Grand Tournament in Fishing Clash arrives. Get ready for a real challenge and survive in a series of battles with other players in the world.

Here’s the deal:

compete with others on a multiplayer basis
use a limited amount of lives in skirmishes
keep the winning streak till the last opponent
snag great rewards

Remember: it’s not about a single win anymore, so do your best and smash them all. Best of luck!

Star madness!

Discover new fish collections. Catch bigger and bigger specimens and get stars. Each new catch in your collection brings you closer to great rewards.
As usual, the rules are simple:
Catch bigger and bigger fish.
Each record fish increases the number of stars in your collection.
Claim awesome rewards!
Will you make it? Will you catch each species, complete collections and become the best angler in the world?

"Here’s what’s new in FC:

• New power-up
Enjoy the newest MULTI-HOOK power-up and catch all the biggest fish even faster!
Use it to catch two fish in one go – a great help when every second matters.

• New fishery – New Zealand
One of the most excellent fishing spots in the world. It boasts the fish-filled ocean that moves along more than 15,000 km coastline – fishing heaven on earth for most angling enthusiasts!

• Minor bugs fixes and windows experience"

Climb up the Skill Tree!
Get the newest update to gain and upgrade new skills. Use the Skill Tokens to unlock fantastic skills and land more huge fish.

Here are some of them:
- Extra weight % for caught fish
- Extra % for getting Skill Tokens – you’ll love this one!
- Instant max combo chance – better chance to immediately fill the combo bar
- Instant catch cap – increasing max. level of instant catch charges at a time.

Cool, right? And there’s much more to get!

"Catch the latest update:

- Added a short on-screen Skill Tree manual
- Fixed some minor events-related bugs
- Improved visual experience of the Wheel of Fortune
- Fixed bug on displaying the Clan Wars ranking
- Minor fixes of general game quality
- Skill tokens now available in Fishing Battle – just look for them during events (they can appear as a rewards from time to time)
"

Another week, another update!

Once again, we've made some minor and major tweaks to improve the game stability and the gameplay experience. We also fixed the bug that sometimes caused black squares to appear when scrolling the fish album.

Have you never fished before? Are you a serious angler or a casual caster? Whatever floats your boat, grab your tackle and go on a thrilling fishing adventure with the newest version of Fishing Clash!

Strike the update!

We keep working hard so you could experience a great fishing adventure. This time, we’ve focused on:

- getting rid of some minor problems that caused the game to be a bit unstable
- some general bug fixing.

So, sit back, relax and grab the newest Fishing Clash version to land an absolute beast!
